attributes.action: prevent MPs living within a 50 mile radius of London from having second homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs who live within 50 miles of London can viably commute to London on a daily basis as per many of their constituents. If there are problems with late sitting, Parliament should be timetabled to keep late sittings to a minimum and in the unavoidable event of late sitting MPs should be allowed to stay in budget hotels, halls of residence, or barracks.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
